bibl.title: Sanskrit-Tibetan Buddhist Terminology based on the Mahāvyutpatti
bibl.extent: ASCII text file using Extended Wylie and Harvard-Kyoto transliteration for Tibetan and Sanskrit respectively ; mvyut-2000.a1-wk ; approx. 950 KB
bibl.note: The source file is based on: Bonzō kanwa shiyaku taikō hon'yaku meigi taishū Ryōzaburō Sakaki 2冊 ; 23cm 京都 / Kyōto 真言宗京都大学 / Shingonshu Kyōto Daigaku Kyōto teikoku daigaku bunka daigaku sōsho, 3,3附巻 1916-1925 Language code of text: jpn Language code of text: san Language code of text: tib

The author would like to express his deep gratitude to Dr Hoshu Mitsuhara and Tooru Aiba for permitting him to produce revised versions of their base e-texts and for allowing these versions to be publicly available.

N.B. The author and publisher have taken all available steps to conform in good faith to the copyright restrictions associated with this text. Should we not have succeeded, the appropriate copyright holder is encouraged to contact us.

projectDesc.p: Philologica Indica et Buddhica aims to build a corpus of TEI Sanskrit texts representative of Indology and (South Asian) Buddhology.

correction.p: The text may need to be re-proofed against Sakaki.

interpretation.p: (1) Sanskrit diacritics are entered using the Unicode Standard Encoding (utf-8):
vowels and diphthongs: a, ā, i, ī, u, ū, ṛ, ṝ, ḷ, e, ai, o, au
gutturals: k, kh, g, gh, ṅ
palatals: c, ch, j, jh, ñ
cerebrals: ṭ, ṭh, ḍ, ḍh, ṇ
dentals: t, th, d, dh, n
labials: p, ph, b, bh, m
(3) No information is available concerning the principles of interpretation employed by the compilers of the base e-texts

refsDecl.p: The original pagination of the base text has not been retained. Instead, section breaks have been added after every two hundred records (e.g., MVY 01 & MVY 02), page breaks after every fifty (e.g., MVY 01:1 & MVY 02:4).

div1.head: Sanskrit-Tibetan Buddhist Terminology based on the Mahāvyutpatti: Philologica Indica et Buddhica transcript

div2.head: MVY 01
div2.p: aṁśuḥ (mvyut_3037) _ 'od gsal ba ; 'od zer ; gsal ba ; gsal ba 'm 'od zer

akliṣṭamanaḥ (mvyut_2020) _ nyon mongs can ma yin pa'i yid

acintyaparivartaḥ (mvyut_7815) _ bsam gyis mi khyab pa la bsgres pa ; bsam gyis mi khyab pa las bsgres pa

adhyavasitaḥ ; adhi+ava+%so+ta (mvyut_2196) _ lhag par chags pa ; lhag par zhen pa

adhyātman arūpasañjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati pītāni pītavarṇāni pītanidarśanāni pītanirbhāsāni tadyathā karṇikārapuṣpaṁ sampannam vā vārāṇaseyaṁ vastraṁ pītaṁ pītavarṇaṁ pītanidarśanaṁ pītanirbhāsam evam evādhyātmam arūpasañjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati pīta varṇāni pītanidarśanāni pītanirbhāsāni idaṁ caturtham abhibhvāyanam (mvyut_1523) _ nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur mthong ba 'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste dper na dong ka'i me tog ; nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur mthong ba 'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste dper na dong ka'i me tog gam yul ba' ra Na si'i ras phun sum tshogs pa ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur mthong ba 'od ser po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur mthong ba 'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni gzil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o ; adhyātmam arūpasañjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni tadyathā umakapuṣpaṁ sampannaṁ vā vārāṇaseyaṁ vastraṁ nīlaṁ nīlavarṇaṁ nīlanidarśanaṁ nīlanirbhāsam evam evādhyātmam arūpasañjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nilavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni idaṁ tṛtīyam abhibhvāyatanam (mvyut_1522) _ de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur mthong ba 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni gzil gyis gnong pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o ; de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur ston pa 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni gzil gyis gnong pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o ; nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur mthong ba 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste dper na zar ma'i me tog ; nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur mthong ba 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste dper na zar ma'i me tog gam yul ba' ra Na s'i'i ra nga sI'i ras phun sum tshogs pa kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur mthong ba 'od sngon po 'byung ba ; nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur mthong ba 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste dper na zar ma'i me tog gam yul ba' ra Na s'i'i ra nga sI'i ras phun sum tshogs pa kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur mthong ba 'od sngon po 'byung ba la lta bu'o ; nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur mthong ba 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste dper na zar ma'i me tog gam yul ba' ra Na s'i'i ra nga sI'i ras phun sum tshogs pa kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur ston pa 'od sngon po 'byung ba ; adhyātmam arūpasañjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati mahadgatāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni tāni khalu rūpāṇy abhibhūya jānāty abhibhūya paśyati evaṁsañjñī ca bhavati idaṁ dvitīyam abhibhvāyatanam (mvyut_1521) _ nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chen por gyur ba'i kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag gzil gyis mnan nas 'du shes gzil gyis mnan nas mthong ste de lta bur 'du shes par gyur ba 'di ni gzil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o
adhyātmam arūpasañjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyaty ayaṁ dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ (mvyut_1512) _ nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o

adhyātmarūpasañjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni tāni khalu rūpāṇy abhibhūya jānāty abhibhūya paśyati evaṁsañjñi ca bhavati idaṁ prathamam abhibhvāyatanaṁ (mvyut_1520) _ nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag gzil gyis mnan nas mthong ste de ltar bu 'du shes par 'gyur ba 'di ni gzil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang pa'o
adhyāpanam ; adhyāyanam ; adhyāyinam ; aghyanam (mvyut_5069) _ tshig 'don du 'jug pa
adhyāpayām āsa (mvyut_6377) _ klog tu bcug pa ; klog tu bcug pa 'm slob tu bcug pa ; slob tu bcug pa
adhyālambate (mvyut_6922) _ grib so cher babs pa
adhyāśayabalaṁ (mvyut_761) _ lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs
adhyāsitaḥ (mvyut_7512) _ gnas pa ; lhan pa ; lhan pa 'm gnas pa
adhvorṇoḍhiḥ ; adhvaurṇaḍhi (mvyut_8401) _ lam na bal thogs pa
anaṅgaṇam (mvyut_2607) _ nyon mongs pa med pa
ananusūyā (mvyut_2426) _ ma rangs pa med pa ; ma rangs pa med pa 'm mi bzod pa ; mi bzod pa

div2.head: MVY 03
div2.p: anukūlapratikūlādayaḥ (mvyut_2645) _ 'thun mi 'thun pa la sogs pa'i ming la ; mthun pa dang mi mthun pa la sogs pa'i ming la

idaṁ punar agram asaṅga jñānam utsṛjya viśiṣṭaparinirvāṇatām sattvā hīnayānaṁ prārthayante yad idam śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānaṁ tebhya uttaramatiṁ rocayisyāmītī yad idaṁ buddhajñānādhyālambanatāyai iti tathāgatasya sattveṣu mahākaruṇopadyate ; idaṁ punar agram asaṅga jñānam utsṛjya viśiṣṭaparinirvāṇārtham sattvā hīnayānaṁ prārthayante yad idam śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānaṁ tebhya uttaramatiṁ rocayisyāmītī yad idaṁ buddhajñānādhyālambanatāyai iti tathāgatasya sattveṣu mahākaruṇopadyate (mvyut_186) _ sems can rnams ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes dam pa khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'di btab zhing gang 'di nyan thos kyi theg pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dman pa tshol ba yin gyi de dag la gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi ye shes pa la dmigs par bya ba'i phir rgya chen po la blos mos par bya'o shes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o ; sems can rnams ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes dam pa khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'di btab zhing gang 'di nyan thos kyi theg pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dman pa tshol ba yin gyis de dag la gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi ye shes pa la dmigs par bya ba'i phir rgya chen po la blos mos par bya'o shes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o

div2.head: MVY 18
div2.p: jñānaketur nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_559) _ ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
jñānagarbhaḥ (mvyut_670) _ ye shes kyi snying po
jñānapāramitā (mvyut_923) _ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o

jñānapūrvaṅgamānabhisaṁskāraniravadyasarvajanmābhimukhapravṛttāḥ (mvyut_799) _ ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro bas mngon par 'du mi byed cing kha na ma tho ba med pa'i tshe rabs thams cad du mngon du zhugs pa rnams ; ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro bas mngon par 'du mi byed cing kha na ma tho ba med par tshe rabs thams cad du mngon du zhugs pa rnams
jñānapratisaraṇena bhavitavyaṁ na vijñānapratisaraṇena (mvyut_1548) _ ye shes la rton par bya'i rnam shes la rton par mi bya
jñānavaśitā (mvyut_780) _ ye shes la dbang ba
jñānavibhūtigarbhaḥ (mvyut_734) _ ye shes 'byor ba'i snying po
jñāpakahetuḥ (mvyut_4460) _ shes byed kyi rgyu ; shes par byed pa'i gtan tshigs

jñāpticaturthakarmaṇopasampanno bhikṣuḥ (mvyut_8754) _ gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyi bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong ; gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyi bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i phyir dge slong ; gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong ; gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i phyir dge slong
jyeṣṭhaḥ (mvyut_2517) _ gtso bo ; rgan rabs ; rgan rabs 'm gtso bo ; thu bo ; thu bo 'm rgan rabs ; thu bo 'm rgan rabs 'm gtso bo
jyeṣṭhaḥ (mvyut_9352) _ chen po ; chen po 'm thu bo ; thu bo
jyotirgaṇaḥ (mvyut_6610) _ skar ma'i tshogs ; skar ma'i tshogs sam snang bar byed pa'i tshogs ; snang bar byed pa'i tshogs

jyotirjvalanārciśrīgarbhaḥ (mvyut_712) _ 'od 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i dpal gyi snying po

jyotiṣprabhaḥ (mvyut_729) _ me'i 'od ; skar ma'i 'od ; skar ma'i 'od dam me'i 'od

tadanyasārūpyopalabdhilakṣaṇam (mvyut_4410) _ de gzhan dang mthun pa dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ; de gzhan dang mthun pa mngon sum du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ; de gzhan dang mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ; de gzhan dang mthun par mngon sum du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ; de las gzhan dang mthun pa dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ; de las gzhan dang mthun pa mngon sum du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ; de las gzhan dang mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ; de las gzhan dang mthun par mngon sum du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid

dharumānusmṛtiḥ (mvyut_1150) _ chos rjes su dran pa
dharmaṁ ca deśayati (mvyut_6322) _ chos kyang ston to
dharmaṁ śaraṇaṁ gacchāmi virāgāṇām agryam (mvyut_8690) _ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mchog chos la skyabs su mchi'o
dharmacakranāmāni (mvyut_1308) _ chos kyi 'khor lo'i ming la
dharmacakrapravartanabalaṁ (mvyut_769) _ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i stobs ; chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'i stobs
dharmatāpratilabdhaḥ (mvyut_6981) _ chos nyid kyis thob pa
dharmatāpratilambhaḥ (mvyut_6980) _ chos nyid kyis thob pa
dharmatāpratilābhikam (mvyut_6982) _ chos nyid kyis rnyed pa
dharmato nirgataḥ ; dharmato nirjitaḥ (mvyut_642) _ chos las 'byung ba
dharmadṛḍhābhedyasunilambhaḥ (mvyut_3409) _ chos la brtan zhing mi phyed par shin tu rten pa ; chos la brtan zhing mi phyed par shin tu ston pa
dharmadeśanāśravaṇādināmāni (mvyut_2759) _ chos 'chad pa dang nyan pa la sogs pa'i ming la ; chos smra ba dang nyan pa dang sgra skad kyi ming la
dharmadhātukuśalaḥ (mvyut_1089) _ chos kyi dbyings la mkha' pa
dharmadhātuniyato nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_514) _ chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
dharmadhātuparamaḥ (mvyut_6429) _ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa
dharmadhātuparyantaḥ (mvyut_370) _ chos kyi dbyings kyis gtugs pa
dharmadhātuviśuddhiḥ (mvyut_110) _ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa
dharmadhātvasambhedaḥ (mvyut_1722) _ 'dres pa med pa ; chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pa ; chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa ; chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa 'm 'dres pa med pa
dharmaniyāmatā (mvyut_1714) _ chos mi 'gyur ba nyid ; chos mi 'gyur nyid
dharmanusārī (mvyut_1022) _ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba
dharmapaṭṭāvabaddhaḥ (mvyut_7058) _ chos kyi cod pan bcings pa
dharmapratisaṁvit (mvyut_197) _ chos so so yang dag par rig pa
dharmapratisaraṇena bhavitavyaṁ na pudgalapratisaraṇena (mvyut_1547) _ chos la rton par bya'i ; gang zag la rton par mi bya
dharmapravicayavibhaktinirdeśakuśalaḥ (mvyut_846) _ chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pas rnam par dbye ba bstan pa la mkhas pa
dharmapravicayasambodhyaṅgam (mvyut_990) _ chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag
dharmarājaputraḥ (mvyut_1090) _ chos kyi rgyal po'i sras
dharmalābhasantuṣṭaḥ (mvyut_2372) _ chos kyi rnyed pas chog par 'dzin pa
dharmavyasanasamvartanīyaḥ (mvyut_6956) _ chos kyis 'phyongs par 'gyur pa ; chos kyis phongs par gyur ba
dharmasaṅgītiḥ (mvyut_1346) _ chos yang dag par sdud pa
dharmasmṛtyupasthānam (mvyut_956) _ chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
dharmādhikāraḥ ; dharmādhikaraṇam (mvyut_3696) _ chos bzhin gcod pa ; chos bzhin spyod pa
dharmānudharmapratipannaḥ (mvyut_1124) _ chos dang rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la zhugs pa ; chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos la zhugs pa
dharmānupratipattiḥ ; dharmānudharmapratipattiḥ (mvyut_1801) _ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi nan tan
dharmāntarāyaḥ (mvyut_6526) _ chos kyi bar du gcod pa
dharmāyatanikam (mvyut_7565) _ chos kyi skye mched pa
dharmārthikaḥ (mvyut_2350) _ chos 'dod pa ; chos don du gnyer ba ; chos don du gnyer ba 'm chos 'dod pa
dharmiko dharmorājā (mvyut_3618) _ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa ; chos ldan chos kyi rgyal po
dharmī dharmalabdhah (mvyut_2430) _ chos dang ldan zhing chos kyis thob pa ; chos dang ldan zhing chos thob pa
dharmodgato nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_568) _ chos kyi 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
dhātupatitaḥ ; dhātupatiḥ (mvyut_7139) _ khams su gtogs pa
dhāraṇīmatir nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_604) _ gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
dhāraṇīmudrā (mvyut_4297) _ gzungs kyi phyag rgya ma
dhāraṇīśrutodgrahaṇārthanirdeśavaiśāradyaṁ (mvyut_782) _ gzungs kyi thos pa 'dzin cing don bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa

dhārmikīkṣitam anupradāsyāmaḥ ; dhārmikīkṣitim anupradāsyāma ; dhārmikīkṣitim anupradāsyām (mvyut_7307) _ cha 'bul ba ; chos bzhin du dpya' ; chos bzhin du dpya' 'm cha 'bul ba ; chos bzhin du kha ; chos bzhin du kha 'm cha 'bul ba
dhuraḥ (mvyut_7213) _ brtson pa ; brtson pa 'm gces pa ; gces pa
dhūpanidhūpitam (mvyut_6133) _ bdug spos kyi bdug pa ; gdug spos kyis gdugs pa
dhūmayaty api prajvalaty api tad yathāpī nāma mahān agniskandhaḥ (mvyut_224) _ du ba 'thul bar yang byed 'bar bar yang byed , de dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ (mvyut_3381) _ 'khor srung ; yul 'khor bsrung ; yul 'khor skyong
dhṛtiḥ (mvyut_7056) _ brtan pa ; mos pa ; mos pa 'm brtan pa
dhyānapāramitā (mvyut_918) _ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin ba
dhyānāntaram (mvyut_1484) _ bsam gtan khyad par can
dhyāmikritam (mvyut_6625) _ mog mog par bya ba ; mog mog par byas pa
dhyāmīkaraṇam (mvyut_6624) _ mog mog par bya ba ; mog mog par byas pa
dhruvam (mvyut_5444) _ nges par ; lags so ; lags so 'm nges par ; los te ; los te 'm nges par

div2.head: MVY 22
div2.p: dhvajahṛtā (mvyut_9450) _ btsan phrogs su thob pa
dhvajāgrakeyūrah (mvyut_1410) _ rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan
dhvajāgrakeyūro nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_530) _ rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
dhvajāgraniśrāvaṇī nāma gaṇanā (mvyut_7980) _ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo nges par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs
dhvasyate bhikṣubhāvāt (mvyut_9127) _ dge slong gi dngos po las nyams par 'gyur ; dge slong gi dngos po las nyams par 'gyur ba
dhvāṅkṣaḥ (mvyut_4863) _ bya rog ; khwa ; khwa 'm bya rog ; spyi rtol can ; spyi rtol can nam khwa ; spyi rtol can nam khwa 'm bya rog
na odanena sūpikaṁ praticchādayiṣyāmaḥ sūpikena vā odanam (mvyut_8570) _ 'bras chan gyi tshod ma ; 'bras chan gyi tshod ma 'm tshod mas 'bras can mi dag pa ; tshod mas 'bras can mi dag pa

na kallo bhavati ; nākallolo bhavati ; na lallo bhavati (mvyut_7156) _ dig pa ; dig pa 'm ldibs par mi 'gyur ; dig pa 'm ljibs par mi 'gyur ; ldibs par mi 'gyur ; ljibs par mi 'gyur ; tig pa ; tig pa 'm ljibs par mi 'gyur
na kavaḍacchedakam ; na karaḍacehādakam ; na kavaḍocchedakam (mvyut_8585) _ kham 'phor mi gcad ; kham 'phro mi bcad
na kuṇḍo bhavati (mvyut_7363) _ lag rdum du mi 'gyur
nakulaḥ (mvyut_4791) _ ne'u le ; ne'u le 'm sre mong ; sre mo ; sre mong
nakulakaḥ (mvyut_6024) _ rgyan ne'u can ; rgyan ne'u le can
nakulākṣaḥ (mvyut_8909) _ mig ne'u le lta bu
na kulmāṣapiṇḍakam ; na kuḍmāṣapiṇḍakam (mvyut_8530) _ 'bra'i phur ma ltar ma yin pa
na kena cid vidhīyate (mvyut_6439) _ gang gis kyang mi bya'o
na kṣubhyate (mvyut_5202) _ 'khrug par ma 'gyur ; 'khrugs par ma 'gyur
nakhaḍgapāṇaye dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8623) _ lag na ral gri thogs pa la chos mi bshad
na kholāśirase dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmi (mvyut_8612) _ zhwa gyon pa la chos mi bshad
na gallāpahārakam ; na galla + apahārakam (mvyut_8584) _ 'khur ba mi sbo ; mkhur ba mi sbo
na gulphe gulpham ādhāya (mvyut_8560) _ long bu'i steng du long bu mi bzhag
na golomakam keśaś chedayet ; na golomakam keśam chedayet ; na golomakam keśācchadayet (mvyut_9331) _ skra chan pas mi breg ; skra chan pas mi dreg
na ca pariprāpayati (mvyut_6658) _ mi sleb pa ; mi slebs
na ca pareṣāṁ doṣāntaraskhalitagaveṣī (mvyut_2379) _ gzhan dag gi nyes pa'i skabs dang 'khrul ba mi tshol

na ca bhagavato mukhadvārasyomiñjitaṁ vā nimiñjitāṁ vā prajñāyate sma (mvyut_6303) _ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba ; bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba 'm btsums par yang mi mngon no ; btsums par yang mi mngon no
na cirāyitakāyaḥ ; na cirayitakāyaḥ (mvyut_6681) _ lus ma bral ba ; lus ma bral ba 'm ma gshegs pa ; lus ma dral ba ; lus ma dral ba 'm ma gshegs pa ; ma gshegs pa
na cuccukārakam (mvyut_8577) _ tsug tsug mi bya
na cchattrapāṇaye dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8621) _ lag na gdugs thogs pa la chos mi bshad
na jihvāniścārakaṁ piṇdapātaṁ bhokṣyāmaḥ ; na jihvāniścārakaṁ piṇdapātraṁ bhokṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8581) _ lce phyung ste zas mi bza'
na jihvāsphoṭakam (mvyut_8586) _ rkan mi btogs ; rkan mi rtog
naṭaḥ ; nāṭaḥ (mvyut_5009) _ blo ; blo gar ; blo 'm blo gar ; gar ; gar ram blo ; gar ram blo 'm blo gar
naṭaraṅgaḥ (mvyut_2837) _ gar gyi ltad mo ba

na taṭe na prapāte na prāgbhāre pātraṁ sthāpayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8599) _ gad ka ma yin pa dang gyang kha ma yin pa dang dkan gzar po ma yin pa la lhung bzed gzhag par bya ; gad ka ma yin pa dang gyang kha ma yin pa dang dkan zar po ma yin pa la lhung bzed gzhag par bya ; gad ka ma yin pa dang gyang kha ma yin pa dang kan gzar po ma yin pa la lhung bzed gzhag par bya ; gad ka ma yin pa dang gyang kha ma yin pa dang kan zar po ma yin pa la lhung bzed gzhag par bya ; gad ka ma yin pa dang gyang sa ma yin pa dang dkan gzar po ma yin pa la lhung bzed gzhag par bya ; gad ka ma yin pa dang gyang sa ma yin pa dang dkan zar po ma yin pa la lhung bzed gzhag par bya ; gad ka ma yin pa dang gyang sa ma yin pa dang kan gzar po ma yin pa la lhung bzed gzhag par bya ; gad ka ma yin pa dang gyang sa ma yin pa dang kan zar po ma yin pa la lhung bzed gzhag par bya ; gad kha ma yin pa dang gyang kha ma yin pa dang dkan gzar po ma yin pa la lhung bzed gzhag par bya ; gad kha ma yin pa dang gyang kha ma yin pa dang dkan zar po ma yin pa la lhung bzed gzhag par bya ; gad kha ma yin pa dang gyang kha ma yin pa dang kan gzar po ma yin pa la lhung bzed gzhag par bya ; gad kha ma yin pa dang gyang kha ma yin pa dang kan zar po ma yin pa la lhung bzed gzhag par bya ; gad kha ma yin pa dang gyang sa ma yin pa dang dkan gzar po ma yin pa la lhung bzed gzhag par bya ; gad kha ma yin pa dang gyang sa ma yin pa dang dkan zar po ma yin pa la lhung bzed gzhag par bya ; gad kha ma yin pa dang gyang sa ma yin pa dang kan gzar po ma yin pa la lhung bzed gzhag par bya ; gad kha ma yin pa dang gyang sa ma yin pa dang kan zar po ma yin pa la lhung bzed gzhag par bya
na tālavṛndakam (mvyut_8529) _ ta la'i lo ma ltar ltab pa ; ta la'i lo ma ltar ma yin pa
na thutthukārakam (mvyut_8579) _ hu hu mi bya
na daṇḍapāṇaye dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8620) _ lag na 'khar ba thogs pa la chos mi bshad ; lag na mkhar ba thogs pa la chos mi bshad
nadati (mvyut_6965) _ sgra 'byin pa ; sgrags pa ; sgrags pa 'm sgra 'byin pa

nadīpūradarśanāduparivṛṣṭyanumānam (mvyut_4634) _ chu 'brug par snang ba las gong du char 'bab par rjes su dpag pa ; chu 'brug par snang ba las gong du char 'bab par rjes su dpog pa ; chu brub par snang ba las gong du char 'bab par rjes su dpag pa ; chu brub par snang ba las gong du char 'bab par rjes su dpog pa ; chu brug par snang ba las gong du char 'bab par rjes su dpag pa ; chu brug par snang ba las gong du char 'bab par rjes su dpog pa
nadī (mvyut_4168) _ 'bab chu ; klung ; klung ngam 'bab chu
nadī vaitaraṇī (mvyut_4192) _ chu bo rab med
na nadyāhāryāhāriṇyāṁ pratisrotaḥ pātreṇodakaṁ grahīṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8600) _ 'bab chu drag po'i rgyun las bzlog ste lhung bzed kyis chu mi bcu
na nāgaśīrṣakaṁ nivāsanaṁ nivāsayiṣyāmīti śikṣā karaṇīyā (mvyut_8531) _ sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka ltar smad gyogs mi bgo bar bslab par bya
na nivartayati (mvyut_7414) _ mi 'grub ; mi skye ; mi skye 'm mi 'grub
na niṣaṇṇā nipannāyāglānāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8602) _ mi na bar nyal ba la 'dug ste chos mi bshad

na nīcatarake niṣaṇṇā uccatarake āsane niṣaṇnāyāglānāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ ; na nīcastarake āsana uccatarake āsane niṣaṇnāyāglānāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8603) _ mi na bar stan mthon po la 'dug pa la stan dma' ba la 'dug ste chos mi bshad
nanu (mvyut_5412) _ 'm ste dri ba'i tshig ; ste dri ba'i tshig
nandiparyāyaḥ (mvyut_2928) _ dga' ba'i rnam grangs kyi ming la
nandīrāgasahagatā (mvyut_6384) _ dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi mod las skyes pa
nandopanandau nāgarājānau (mvyut_3278) _ klu'i rgyal po dga' dang nye dga' gnyis
na pakṣahato bhavati (mvyut_7365) _ gzhog phyed skam par mi 'gyur ; gzhogs phyed skams par mi 'gyur
na paritasyati ; na paritrasyati (mvyut_6813) _ yongs su mi 'chad ; yongs su mi chad
na paryastikayā ; na paryastikaryā (mvyut_8544) _ phrag pa gnyis ka la mi gzar ; phrag pa gnyis ka las ma zar
na paryastikākṛtāyāglānāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8610) _ mi na bar phag pa gnyis gas gzar pa la chos mi bshad ; mi na bar phyag pa gnyis ka la gzar ba la chos mi bshad
na pātrasandhunakam (mvyut_8590) _ lhung bzed mi bskyom ; lhung bzed mi skyom
na pātrāvalehakam (mvyut_8588) _ lhung bzed mi byog
na pātreṇa vighasaṁ cchorayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8596) _ lhung bzed kyi nang du zas kyi lhag ma blugs te mi 'dor
na pādukārūḍhāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmi ; na pādakarūḍhāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmi (mvyut_8619) _ lham mthon po gyon pa la chos mi bshad
na pāde pādam ādhāya (mvyut_8558) _ rkan pa mi bsnol
na punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāmaguṇair lipyate ; na punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāmaguṇair liptaḥ (mvyut_871) _ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis ma gos pa
na pṛṣṭhato gacchantaḥ purato gacchate aglānāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8604) _ mi na bar mdun du 'gro ba la phyi nas 'gro zhing chos mi bshad
na pratyavekṣāsanam ; na pratyavekṣosanam (mvyut_8556) _ stan la ma brtags par
na phutphukārakam (mvyut_8580) _ phu phu mi bya
na bāhupracālakam (mvyut_8551) _ lag pa mi bskyod ; lag pa mi skyog
na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṁ maraṇāt (mvyut_4662) _ de bzhin gshegs pa shi nas med
na maulīśirase dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8613) _ mgo cod pan can la chos mi bshad
na yānārūḍhāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8618) _ bzhon pa'i steng na 'dug pa la chos mi bshad
narakaḥ (mvyut_4749) _ dmyal ba ; sems can dmyal ba
narapatiḥ (mvyut_3704) _ mi bdag ; mi'i bla ; rgyal po ; rgyal po 'm mi'i bla
nartakaḥ (mvyut_5008) _ blo mkhan ; gar mkhan ; gar mkhan nam blo mkhan
na laṅgo bhavati (mvyut_7364) _ rkang rdum du mi 'gyur
navatiḥ (mvyut_8158) _ dgu bcu ; dgu bcu tham pa
navatipātayantikādharmāḥ (mvyut_8417) _ ltung byed dgu bcu'i ming
navanalinapattrasuviśuddhanayanā (mvyut_5209) _ pad ma gzhon nu'i 'dab ma ltar spyan shin tu rnam par dag pa
nava pramodyapūrvakā dhasmāḥ (mvyut_1585) _ mchog tu dga' ba'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos dgu'i ; mchog tu dga' ba'i sngon du 'gro ba'i ming la
navamaṁ daśakam (mvyut_8507) _ bcu pa dgu pa la
navamālikā ; navamallikā (mvyut_6156) _ na ba ma li ka
navayānasamprasthitaḥ (mvyut_6998) _ theg pa la gsar du bzhugs pa
navavadhūḥ (mvyut_3919) _ bag gsar ; bag gsar ram mna' ma gsar pa ; bag ma ; bag ma 'm mna' ma gsar pa ; mna' ma gsar pa
navasattvāvāsāḥ (mvyut_2288) _ sems can gi gnas dgu'i ming la
navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiḥ (mvyut_1498) _ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
na vikalendriyo bhavati (mvyut_7366) _ dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur
na vikṣipya pādau (mvyut_8562) _ rkang mi gdang
na viḍaṅgikayā (mvyut_8563) _ 'doms mi snang ; mdom mi snang
na vipṛṣṭhībhavati asya mānasam (mvyut_7274) _ de'i yid phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur
na virāgayati (mvyut_2395) _ thugs byung bar mi byed

na viṣṭhihati ; na viṣṭhiraṇāti (mvyut_6821) _ ma 'gyur ; ma 'gyur ram mi thogs ; ma 'gyur ram mi thogs sam ma sdod ; ma 'gyur ram mi thogs sam ma sdod dam rgyun mi 'chad pa ; ma sdod ; ma sdod dam rgyun mi 'chad pa ; mi thogs ; mi thogs sam ma sdod ; mi thogs sam ma sdod dam rgyun mi 'chad pa ; rgyun mi 'chad pa
na veṣṭitaśirase dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8614) _ mgo dkris pa la chos mi bshad
na vyantīkaroti (mvyut_7044) _ byang bar mi byed pa
na vyastikākṛtāyāglānāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8609) _ mi na bar gnya' gong du bsnol ba la chos mi bshad
na vyāhārarutavākparamaḥ (mvyut_1811) _ brjod pa'i sgra dang smra ba lhur byed pa ma yin ; brjod pa'i sgra dang smra ba lhur byed pa ma yin pa'i
na śastrapāṇaye dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8622) _ lag na mtshon cha thogs pa la chos mi bshad ; lag na mtshon thogs pa la chos mi bshad
na śivikārūḍhāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8617) _ khyogs na 'dug pa la chos mi bshad
na śuścukārakam (mvyut_8578) _ cag cag mi bya ; lcag lcag mi bya
na śravaṇapathm āgamiṣyati ; na śravaṇapathamārgam iṣyati (mvyut_6459) _ rna lam du grags par mi 'gyur
na saṅkṣipya pādau (mvyut_8561) _ rkang pa mi dgug
na santrāsam āpadyate (mvyut_1826) _ dngangs par mi 'gyur
na sannaddhāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8625) _ go cha gyon pa la chos mi bshad
na sakthani sakthyādhāya (mvyut_8559) _ brla mi bsnol
na samatīrthikam ; na samatittikam (mvyut_8565) _ mu dang kha dang bcad du ma yin pa
na samanupaśyati (mvyut_2677) _ rjes su mi mthong ba
na samasūpikam (mvyut_8566) _ tshod ma dang mnyam par ma yin
na sarvakāyaṁ samavardhāya (mvyut_8557) _ lus thams cad kyis lcid gyis mi dbab ; lus thams cad kyis ljid gyis mi dbab

nasādhikapauruṣyaṁ vṛkṣam adhirokṣyāma anyatrāpada iti śikṣā karaṇīyā (mvyut_8629) _ gnod pa byung ba ma gtogs par shin la mi gang tsam las mthor mi 'dzegs pa la bslab par bya ; gnod pa byung ba ma gtogs par shin la mi gang tsam las mthor mi gzeg pa la bslab par bya ; gnod pa byung ba ma rtogs par shing las gang tsam las mtho bar mi 'dzeg par bslab par bya ; gnod pa byung ba ma rtogs par shin la mi gang tsam las mthor mi 'dzegs pa la bslab par bya ; gnod pa byung ba ma rtogs par shin la mi gang tsam las mthor mi gzeg pa la bslab par bya

na sāmiṣam udakam antargṛhe chorayiṣyāmaḥ santaṁ gṛhiṇam anavalokya ; na sāmikhom udakam antargṛhe chorayiṣyāmaḥ santaṁ gṛhiṇam anavalokya (mvyut_8595) _ khyim du 'dug pa la ma dris par zas dang 'bags pa'i chu khyim pa'i khyim du mi dbo ; khyim na 'dug pa la ma dris par zas dang 'bags pa'i chu khyim pa'i khyim du mi dbo
na sāmiṣeṇa pāṇinodakasthālakaṁ grahīṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8592) _ lag pas zas dang 'bags pas chu snod la mi bzung ; lag pas zas dang sbags pas chu snod la mi bzung
na sāmiṣeṇodakenāntarikaṁ (mvyut_8593) _ drung du 'dug pa'i dge slong la zas dang 'bags pa'i chu snod mi gtor ; drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong la zas dang 'bags pa'i chu snod mi gtor
na sālopena mukhena vācaṁ pravyāhariṣyāmaḥ ; na sālopena mukhena vāraṁ pravyāhariṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8576) _ kha kham gyis bkang ste mi smra
na sikthapṛthakkārakam (mvyut_8582) _ 'bru gnas tha dad du mi bya ; 'bru nas tha dad mi bya
na soḍhaukikayā (mvyut_8553) _ phrag pa mi sprad
na skambhākṛtāḥ (mvyut_8549) _ dkur ma brten ; dkur mi bsten
nastakaraṇam (mvyut_9034) _ snar blugs pa'i spyad ; snar glugs pa'i spyad

na stūpākṛtimavamṛdya piṇḍapātaṁ paribhokṣyāmaḥ ; na stūpākṛtimavamṛdya piṇḍapātraṁ paribhokṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8591) _ mchod rten dang 'dra bar byas te zas mi bza' ; mchod rten dang 'dra bar sbrus te zas mi bza'
na hastasandhunakam (mvyut_8589) _ lag pa mi sprug
na hastasaṁlagnikayā (mvyut_8554) _ lag kha mi sbrel ; lag pa mi sbrel
na hastāvalehakam (mvyut_8587) _ lag pa mi bldag pa ; lag pa mi ldag pa
na hastituṇḍāvalambitam (mvyut_8528) _ glang po che'i sna ltar bdar ba ma yin pa
na hastyārūḍhāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8615) _ glang po che la zhon pa la chos mi bshad
nāgakeśaḥ (mvyut_8803) _ skra ba lang gi spu 'dra ba
nāgarājanāmāni (mvyut_3226) _ klu'i rgyal po'i ming la ; klu'i rgyal po'i rnam kyi ming la
nāgavikrāntagāmī (mvyut_280) _ glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa
nāgavilokitenāvalokya (mvyut_6371) _ glang po che'i lta stangs kyis bltas nas ; glang po che'i lta stangs kyis ltas nas
nāgasvaraśabdā (mvyut_477) _ glang po che'i sgra skad ; klu'i sgra skad
nāglānā utthitā uccāraprasrāvaṁ kariṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8626) _ mi na bar 'greng ste bshang gci mi bya ; mi na bar 'greng ste bshang lci mi bya
nāglānā udaka uccāraprasrāvaṁ kheṭaṁ siṅghāṇakaṁ vāntaṁ viriktaṁ cchorayiṣyāmi (mvyut_8627) _ mi na bar chu'i nang du bshang gci dang mchil ma dang snabs dang skyugs pa dang kha nas byung ba mi dor

nāglānāḥ saharitapṛthivīpradeśe uccāraprasrāvaṁ kheṭaṁ siṅghāṇakaṁ vāntaṁ viriktaṁ cchorayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8628) _ mi na bar rtsa sngon po yod pa'i sa phyogs su bshang gci dang mchil ma dang snabs dang skyugs pa dang kha nas byung ba mi dor ; mi na bar rtsa sngon po yod pa'i sa phyogs su bshang lci dang mchil ma dang snabs dang skyugs pa dang kha nas byung ba mi dor
nātikṣuṇakair ālopaiḥ ; nātikhuntannakirālopaiḥ (mvyut_8572) _ kham ha cang chung ba yang ma yin ; kham ha cang chung ba'ng ma yin
nātijalpet (mvyut_7024) _ ha cang smra ba man du mi bya ; ha cang smra ba yang mi bya
nātidūram (mvyut_5112) _ ha cang mi ring ba ; ha cang yang mi ring
nātimahantam (mvyut_8573) _ kham ha cang chen po ma yin ; kham ha cang chen po yang ma yin
nātiśītam (mvyut_6358) _ ha cang yang mi grang
nātisaret (mvyut_7025) _ ha cang 'phro bar mi bya ; ha cang 'phro bar mi byed
nātyavakṛṣṭaṁ cīvaram ; nātyupakṛṣṭaṁ cīvaram (mvyut_8533) _ chos gos ha cang 'jol ba ma yin
nātyavakṛṣṭam ; nātyuprakṛṣṭaḥ (mvyut_8527) _ ha cang 'jol ba ma yin pa
nātyāyatavadanaḥ (mvyut_314) _ zhal ha cang yang mi ring ba
nātyāsannam (mvyut_5113) _ ha cang mi nye ; ha cang yang mi nye

div2.head: MVY 23
div2.p: nātyutkṛṣṭaṁ cīvaram (mvyut_8532) _ chos gos ha can brdzes pa ma yin pa ; chos gos ha can rtsengs pa ma yin pa
nātyutkṛṣṭam ; nātyāskṛṣṭaḥ (mvyut_8526) _ ha cang brdzes pa ma yin pa ; ha can rtsengs pa ma yin pa
nātyuṣṇam (mvyut_6359) _ ha cang yang mi dro
nānanujñātāḥ (mvyut_8555) _ ma bgo bar ; ma bsgo bar
nānāgate ālope mukhadvāraṁ vivariṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8575) _ kham ma gzas par kha mi gdang | kham ma bzas par kha mi gdang

nānāgate khādanīye bhojanīye pātram upanāmayiṣyāmaḥ ; nānāgate khādanīye bhojanīye pātram udhānāmayiṣyamaḥ (mvyut_8569) _ bza' ba dang bca' ba ma 'ongs par lhung bzed ltung gzed mi bzed ; gza' ba dang bca' ba ma 'ongs par lhung bzed ltung gzed mi bzed
nānāguṇanāmāni (mvyut_2349) _ yon tan sna tshogs kyi ming la
nānātathāgatanāmāni (mvyut_81) _ de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i mtshan la

nānātvakāyā ekatvasañjñinas tadyathā devā brahmakāyikāḥ prathamābhinirvṛttāḥ (mvyut_2290) _ lus tha dad la 'du shes gcig pa dag dper na tshangs rigs kyi lha dag dang po 'byung ba'o ; lus tha dad la 'du shes gcig pa dag dper na tshangs ris kyi lha dag dang po 'byung ba'o

nānātvakāyā nānātvasañjñinaḥ tadyathā manuṣyā ekatyāśca devāḥ (mvyut_2289) _ lus tha dad cing 'du shes tha dad pa dag dper na mi rnams dang kha gcig go ; lus tha dad cing 'du shes tha dad pa dag dper na mi rnams dang lha rnams cig go
nānādṛṣṭyanuśayaparyavasthānakleśapraśamanakuśalaḥ (mvyut_862) _ lta ba tha dad pa dang bag la nyal dang kun nas dkris pa'i nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa la mkhas pa
nānādhātujñānabalam (mvyut_123) _ khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs
nānādhimuktijñānabalam (mvyut_122) _ mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs
nānābuddhakṣetrasannipatitāḥ (mvyut_6265) _ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa
nānābodhisattvanāmāni (mvyut_644) _ byang chub sems dpa' so so'i mtshan la
nānāvyādhiparigataḥ (mvyut_7155) _ nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa
nānāśrāvakanāmāni (mvyut_1029) _ nyan thos so so'i ming la
nānāstīrṇapṛthivīpradeśe pātraṁ sthāpayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8597) _ 'og gzhi med pa'i sa phyogs su lhung bzed mi bzhag ; 'og gzhi med pa'i sa phyogs su lhung bzed mi gzhag
nābādhayati sma (mvyut_6598) _ gnod par ma gyur to
nāmadheyam anuvitarkitam (mvyut_6684) _ min rjes su brtags pas
nāmaniyatapraveśo nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_576) _ ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
nāma (mvyut_5440) _ chug kyang ; gyur du zin kyang ; gyur du zin kyang ngam chug kyang
nāmopadeśena (mvyut_6683) _ ming bstan pa yis ming bstan pas
nāmnāyate (mvyut_6706) _ mi 'byung ; mi 'byung ba ; mi brjod pa ; mi brjod pa 'm mi 'byung ; mi bzod pa ; mi bzod pa 'm mi 'byung ba
nāyakaḥ (mvyut_3698) _ sde dpon ; sde sna ; sde sna 'm sde dpon
nāyudhapāṇaye dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8624) _ lag na dgra cha sta thogs pa la chos mi bshad ; lag na dgra sta thogs pa la chos mi bshad
nārāśībhāvaḥ ; narāśībhāvaḥ (mvyut_2588) _ sbungs pa'i dngos po med pa ; spungs pa'i dngos po med pa

nāvadhyānaprekṣiṇo 'ntarikasya bhikṣoḥ pātram avalokayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8594) _ drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong gi lhung bzed la 'phyas gdags pa'i phyir mi blta ; drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong gi lhung gzed la 'phyas gdags pa'i phyir mi blta
nāvarṇakārakam ; navarṇakarakam (mvyut_8583) _ 'phyas mi gdags ; chas mi gdags
nāśvārūḍhāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8616) _ rta la zhon pa la chos mi bshad ; rta zhon pa la chos mi bshad
nāsīraḥ ; nāsiraḥ (mvyut_3745) _ snga tshoms ; snga tshoms tshogs
nāsti tathāgatasya skhalitam (mvyut_136) _ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul ba med pa
nāsti nānātvasamjñā (mvyut_140) _ tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa
nāsti prajñāyā hāniḥ (mvyut_146) _ shes rab nyams pa med pa
nāstimuṣitasmṛtitā ; nāstimuṣitasmṛtiḥ (mvyut_138) _ bsnyel ba med pa
nāsti ravitam (mvyut_137) _ ca co med pa
nāsti vimuktihāniḥ (mvyut_147) _ rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa
nāsti vīryasya hāṇiḥ (mvyut_143) _ brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa
nāsti samādhihāniḥ (mvyut_145) _ ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa
nāsti smṛtihāniḥ (mvyut_144) _ dran pa nyams pa med pa
nāsty apratisaṅkhyāyopekṣā (mvyut_141) _ so sor ma rtogs pa'i btang snyoms med pa
nāsty asamāhitacittam (mvyut_139) _ sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa ; sems mnyam par ma gzhag pa med pa
nāsty cchandasya hāniḥ (mvyut_142) _ 'dun pa nyams pa med pa
niḥkāṅkṣadharmajñānaḥ (mvyut_364) _ chos mkhyen pa la nem nur med pa
niḥpudgalāḥ sarvadharmāḥ (mvyut_158) _ chos thams cad ni gang zag med pa yin na sems can rnams bdag med pa
niḥsattvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ sattvāś cādi (mvyut_156) _ chos thams cad ni sems can med pa yin na sems can rnams bdag med pa
niḥsaraṇaprajñaḥ (mvyut_1105) _ nyes par 'byung ba'i shes rab can
nikāmalābhī (mvyut_2431) _ ci 'dod pa bzhin thob pa
nikāyasabhāgasyāvedhaḥ ; nikāyāsabhāgasya badhyaḥ (mvyut_7004) _ rigs 'thun par 'phen pa ; rigs mthun par 'phen pa ; ris 'thun par 'phen pa ; ris mthun par 'phen pa
nikūlam (mvyut_2709) _ 'bar 'bur ; 'bar 'bur ram mtho dman ; mtho dman
nikṣipati (mvyut_5176) _ 'doms ; 'god pa ; 'god pa 'm 'jog pa ; 'god pa 'm 'jog pa 'm 'doms ; 'jog pa ; 'jog pa 'm 'doms
nikṣipte pade avanamati (mvyut_6768) _ rkang pa bzhag na nems shes byed ; rkang pa bzhag na nems shes byed pa
nikṣepaḥ (mvyut_7222) _ bzhag pa ; bzhag pa 'm btam pa ; bzhag pa 'm gtams pa ; btam pa ; gtams pa
nigrahasthānam (mvyut_4542) _ tshar bcad pa'i gnas chad pa'i gnas
nigrahītavyaḥ (mvyut_5358) _ chad pas gcad pa ; chad pas gcad pa 'm tshar gcad pa skabs dang sbyar ; tshar gcad pa skabs dang sbyar
nighaṇṭuḥ ; nigaṇṭuḥ (mvyut_5051) _ sgra nges par brjod pa ; sgra nges par sbyor ba
nicayaḥ (mvyut_5075) _ mang po ; mang po 'm phal po che ; mang po 'm phal po che 'm phung po ; phal po che ; phal po che 'm phung po ; phung po
nicitaḥ ; niścitaḥ (mvyut_6839) _ brtsags pa stsags pa ; bsags pa
nitīraṇam (mvyut_7471) _ nges par rtog pa ; nges par rtog pa 'm phye ste rtog pa ; phye ste rtog pa
nityayuktaḥ ; nityaprayukta ; nityaprabha (mvyut_715) _ rtag tu 'od ; rtag tu spyor ba
nityābhiratā vateme sattvā ekāntakliṣṭā duḥkhabhājane gṛhāvāse (mvyut_184) _ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khyim gi gnas nas sdug bsngal gyi snod kun nas nyon mongs pa can rtag tu dga' ba
nidāghaḥ (mvyut_8259) _ sos ka tsha ba'i dus ; sos ka'i tsha ba'i dus
nidhyāyati (mvyut_7462) _ nges par sems par byed
nipakasyāṅgasambhāraiḥ ; nipakasyāṅgasambharaiḥ (mvyut_7023) _ 'gru skyang gyi yang lag gi tshogs ; 'grus skyong gi yang lag gi 'tshogs
nipuṇaḥ (mvyut_2906) _ brtags pa ; mkhas pa ; rtag pa ; rtogs pa ; rtogs pa 'm mkhas pa
nimittaniḥsaraṇam animittam (mvyut_1602) _ mtshan ma las 'byin pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o

nimittam (mvyut_7626) _ mtshan ; mtshan ma ; mtshan ma 'm rgyu hetur dang ka ra Na dang 'dom na rgyu mtshan ; mtshan nam rgyu ; rgyu ; rgyu 'dom na byed rgyu ; rgyu hetur dang ka ra Na dang 'dom na rgyu mtshan ; rgyu mtshan ; rgyu mtshan nam rgyu 'dom na byed rgyu
nimittam (mvyut_6804) _ ltas ; mtshan ma ; mtshan ma 'm ltas
nimittaviparyayaḥ ; nimittāvidhiparyāyaḥ (mvyut_9303) _ rtsod pa'i mtshan ma las bsgyur ba
nimnam (mvyut_5276) _ dma' ba ; gshong ; gshong ngam dma' ba
niyatadhvajaketur nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_515) _ nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
niyatabhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya māraṇam (mvyut_2331) _ byang chub sems dpa' nges pa'i sa la gnas pa bsad pa ; nes pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsad pa
niyatavedanīyam (mvyut_2311) _ myon bar 'gyur ba nges pa
nirataḥ (mvyut_1808) _ 'bad pa ; 'bad pa brtson pa ; 'bad pa 'm brtson pa ; brtson pa

nirargaḍayajñāḥ (mvyut_2867) _ gtan pa sri ba med pa'i mchod sbyin
niravadyaḥ (mvyut_61) _ kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba
nirākaraṇam (mvyut_7249) _ bshig pa ; bzlog pa ; bzlog pa 'm bshig pa
nirādānaḥ (mvyut_64) _ len pa mi mnga' ba
nirāmagandhaḥ (mvyut_6784) _ 'm dri bshul ba med pa ; dri nga ba med pa ; dri bshul ba med pa
nirāmiṣadharmadeckaḥ (mvyut_842) _ zang zing med pa chos ston pa
nirāsvādaḥ (mvyut_6894) _ ro bro ba med pa
niruktiniyatapraveśo nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_522) _ nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
niruktipratisaṁvit (mvyut_199) _ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa
nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇam (mvyut_1727) _ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa
nirupalepaḥ (mvyut_6672) _ chags pa med pa ; chags pa med pa 'm dgos pa med pa ; dgos pa med pa
nirūpaṇā (mvyut_7450) _ nges par rtog pa ; nges par rtogs pa
nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ (mvyut_1323) _ 'gog pa mngon du byas
nirodhasamāpattiḥ (mvyut_1988) _ 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug pa ; 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ (mvyut_1225) _ 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa
nirodhe dharmajñānam (mvyut_1226) _ 'gog pa la chos shes pa
nirodhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ (mvyut_1227) _ 'gog pa la rjes su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa
nirodhe 'nvayajñānam (mvyut_1228) _ 'gog pa la rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa
nirgrantho jñātiputraḥ (mvyut_3550) _ gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu
nirghātaḥ (mvyut_4389) _ gnam grum pa'i sgra drag po ; sgra drag po
nirghoṣākṣaravīmukto nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_598) _ sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
nirjivāḥ sarvadharmāḥ (mvyut_157) _ chos thams cad ni srog med pa yin na sems can rnams bdag med pa
nirjvaraḥ ; nis+jvara (mvyut_75) _ nad mi mnga' ba
nirdhāntam ; nirdāntam (mvyut_2599) _ bcom btso ma ; srab pa ; srab pa 'm bcom btso ma
nirdhāraṇam (mvyut_6567) _ dmigs kyi dbye ba ; dmigs kyis dbye ba
nirbhayaḥ (mvyut_62) _ snyems pa mi mnga' ba
nirmamaḥ (mvyut_59) _ bdag gi ba med pa
nirmātā ; nirmātṛ (mvyut_6474) _ 'phrul byed pa ; 'phrul pa po ; 'phrul pa po 'm 'phrul byed pa ; sprul byed
niryāṇam ; niryānam (mvyut_4986) _ bdun du rgyu ba ; mdun du bsnur ba ; mdun du bsnur ba rnur ba

div2.head: MVY 24
div2.p: niryātaḥ (mvyut_2544) _ nges par 'byung ba ; tshar phyin pa
niryāti (mvyut_2545) _ nges par 'byung ba ; mthar phyin pa ; mthar phyin pa 'm nges par 'byung ba ; tshar phyin pa
niryūhaḥ (mvyut_5525) _ ba gam sam sgo khang skabs dang sbyar
niryūhaḥ (mvyut_4360) _ ba gam skabs dang sbyar ; sgro khang ; sgro khang ngam ba gam skabs dang sbyar

nirlopaṁ harati ; nirlopaṁ nirlopaharati (mvyut_5366) _ ma lus par 'phrog pa ; ril bzlums te ma lus par 'phrog pa ; ril gyis ; ril gyis sam rlings kyis ; ril gyis sam rlings kyis sam ma lus par 'phrog pa ; rlings kyis ; rlings kyis sam ma lus par 'phrog pa
nirvāṇaparyāyāḥ (mvyut_1724) _ mya ngan las 'das kyi rnam grangs la ; mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa'i ming la
nirvāṇamārgāvasthitaḥ (mvyut_1095) _ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la gnas pa
nirvikalpakam (mvyut_4472) _ rnam par rtog pa med pa ; rnam par rtogs pa med pa
nirvikalpam (mvyut_7451) _ rnam par rtog pa med pa 'm

nirviśeṣaḥ (mvyut_6676) _ bye brag med pa ; bye brag med pa 'm khyad par med pa ; khyad par med pa
nirviṣī ; nirviśī (mvyut_5820) _ bong nga nag po
nirvedhabhagakramaḥ (mvyut_1210) _ nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i rim pa'i ming la
nirvedhabhāgīyaḥ (mvyut_1211) _ nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa ; nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa
nilayaḥ (mvyut_5564) _ gnas ; gnas sam tshang ; tshang
nivāraṇam ; nivaraṇam (mvyut_6511) _ chod pa ; chod pa 'm sgrib pa ; sgrib pa
nivāsanena sapta (mvyut_8524) _ sham thabs la rnam pa bdun ; sham thabs rnam pa bdun
nivṛtāvyākṛtāḥ (mvyut_6889) _ bsgrib ba'i lung du mi ston pa ; bsgribs pa ; bsgribs pa 'm lung du bstan pa ; lung du bstan pa
niśādāśilā (mvyut_7515) _ gtun gyi gzhi ; mchig ; mchig gam gtun gyi gzhi
niścitto nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_539) _ sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
niśrayaḥ (mvyut_5623) _ gnas ; gnas sam rten ; rten
niṣadanagatam ; nipadanagatam (mvyut_8514) _ gting ba las gyur pa
niṣkleśaḥ (mvyut_1076) _ nyon mongs pa med pa
niṣṭhuraḥ (mvyut_2955) _ bskri ba med pa ; btsam pa med pa ; btsam pa med pa 'm bskri ba med pa ; sri ba med pa
niṣparidāhā (mvyut_465) _ yongs su gdung ba med pa
niṣpulam ; niṣphalam ; niṣpulaṁ ; nippulam (mvyut_7635) _ shin te med pa ; shin te med pa 'm snyigs ma med pa ; shin tu med pa ; shin tu med pa 'm snyigs ma med pa ; snyigs ma med pa

netaretareṇa santuṣṭiḥ (mvyut_2216) _ ngan ngon gyis chog mi shes pa
naiḥsargikāḥ pāyattikāḥ ; naiḥsargikāḥ naisargikapāpattikā (mvyut_8383) _ spang ba'i ltung byed sum bcu'i ming la
naikaśaḥ (mvyut_6580) _ re re las ma yin ; re re las ma yin nam rnam pa gcig tu ma yin ; rnam pa gcig tu ma yin

nairātmyāḥ sarva dharmāḥ sattvāś ca nairātmyaṁ nādhimucyante ; atas tathāgatasya sattveṣu mahākaruṇotpadyate (mvyut_155) _ chos thams cad ni bdag med pa yin na sems can rnams bdag med pa la ma mos pas , de'i phir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o

nairātmyādhigamātparaviheṭhanānimittasamudācārasahajānadhigateryāpathatriṣkarmapariśuddha mahārakṣasampannavaiśāradyam (mvyut_783) _ bdag med pa khong du chud pas gzhan gyis brtse ba'i mtshan ma mi 'byung zhing rang bzhin gyis spyod lam smad du yung ba'i med pa'i las gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsrung ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i mi 'jigs pa
nairyāṇikaḥ sambodhigāmī (mvyut_1299) _ nges par byung ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro bar byed pa
nairvedhikaprajñaḥ (mvyut_1106) _ nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab can
nairvedhikasarvabhavatalopagato nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_596) _ rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khongs su chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
naiva bhavati na na bhavatitathāgataḥ paraṁ maraṇāt ; naiva bhavati na na bhavatitathāgataḥ paraṁ maraṇataḥ (mvyut_4664) _ de bzhin gshegs pa shi nas yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin
naiva śāśvato nāśāśvataśca (mvyut_4657) _ rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin ; rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang min
naivaśaikṣanāśaikṣaḥ (mvyut_1735) _ slob pa ma yin mi slob pa ma yin ; slob pa ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin ; slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa ma yin ; slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin

naivasañjñānāsañjñāyatanam (mvyut_3113) _ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
naivāntavān nānantavān (mvyut_4660) _ mtha' yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin
naiṣkramyāśritaḥ (mvyut_6755) _ nyes par 'byung ba la brten pa
naiṣpeśikatvam (mvyut_2495) _ thob cing 'jal ba ; thob kyis 'jal ba
naisargikāpattiḥ (mvyut_9309) _ spang ba'i ltung byed ; spong ba'i ltung ba
nojjaṅkikayā (mvyut_8546) _ 'jal thabs su ma yin ; 'jol thabs su ma yin
no tu vigṛhya vādaḥ (mvyut_7610) _ brtsad cing smra bar mi bya
notkṛṣṭikākṛtāyāglānāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8607) _ mi na bar brdzes pa la chos mi bshad ; mi na bar rdzes pa pa la chos mi bshad
notkṛṣṭkayā (mvyut_8541) _ mgo mi brdze ; mgo mi gyog
notthitāḥ pātraṁ nirmādayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8598) _ 'grengs te lhung bzed mi bkru
notthito niṣaṇṇāyāglānāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8601) _ mi na bar 'dug pa la 'grengs te chos mi bshad

notpathena gacchantaḥ pathena gacchate aglānāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8605) _ mi na bar lam nas 'gro ba la lam gyi 'gram nas 'gro zhing chos mi bshad ; mi na bar mal nas 'gro ba la lam gyi 'gram nas 'gro zhing chos mi bshad
notsaktikayā (mvyut_8542) _ mgo mi gzar ; mgo mi zar
notsaktikākṛtāyāglānāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8608) _ mi na bar gzar ba la chos mi bshad
nodguṇṭhikākṛtāyāglānāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ ; nodguṣṭhikakṛtāyāglānāya dharmaṁ deśayiṣyāmaḥ (mvyut_8606) _ mi na bar mgo gyogs pa la chos mi bshad
nodvyastikayā (mvyut_8543) _ gnya' gong du mi bsnol

nopagacchati (mvyut_6483) _ khas mi len pa ; nye bar mi 'gro ; nye bar mi 'gro 'm khas mi len pa ; nye bar mi rig ; nye bar mi rig gam nye bar mi 'gro ; nye bar mi rig gam nye bar mi 'gro 'm khas mi len pa
nopaiti (mvyut_5088) _ mi 'phod de nye bar mi 'gro ; mi chog ; mi chog gam mi 'phod de nye bar mi 'gro ; mi phod ; mi phod dam nye bar mi 'gro ; nye bar mi 'gro

paṁsanaṁ (mvyut_2631) _ bshung ba ; bshung ba 'm smad pa ; smad pa
pakṣaguptaḥ (mvyut_4907) _ 'dab skyongs ; 'dab skyob ; bya'i ming ste pa kSHi dang 'dom na 'dab skyong ces gdags
pakṣapaṇḍakaḥ (mvyut_8770) _ ma ning zla phyed pa ; zla ba phyed pa

pakṣmākṣaḥ (mvyut_8908) _ rdzi ma nan du 'dzug pa ; rdzi ma nan du 'jug pa

pañcendriyāṇi (mvyut_976) _ dbang po lnga'i ming la
pañcopānantarīyāṇi (mvyut_2329) _ 'tshams med pa dang nye ba lnga'i ming la ; mtshams med pa dang nye ba lnga'i ming la

div2.head: MVY 25

patnī (mvyut_3897) _ btsun mo ; chung ma ; chung ma 'm khyo mo ; chung ma 'm khyo mo 'm btsun mo ; khyo mo ; khyo mo 'm btsun mo

pariṇāmanam (mvyut_8415) _ bsdos pa las bsgyur ba
pariṇāmanavidhihjñāḥ (mvyut_794) _ yong su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams
pariṇāmanābhisandhiḥ (mvyut_1675) _ bsgyur ba la ldem por dgongs pa ; sbyor ba la ldem por dgongs pa
pariṇāyakaratnam (mvyut_3628) _ blon po rin po che ; bu stong tshang ba'i yon tan gyi rim pa la

pariniṣpannalakṣaṇam (mvyut_1665) _ yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid
paripanthaṁ tiṣṭhati (mvyut_5351) _ lam chod cing 'dug pa ; lam gcod cing 'dug pa

sa prīter virāgād upekṣako viharati smṛtaḥ samprajānan sukhaṁ ca kāyena pratisaṁvedayati yattad āryā ācakṣate upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhaṁ viharatīti niṣprītikaṁ tṛtīyaṁ dhyānam upasampadya viharati (mvyut_1480) _ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste dga' ba med pa'i bstam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so ; bde ba lus kyis myong la ; de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te

div2.head: MVY 45
div2.p: samudralakṣaṇam (mvyut_5060) _ rgya mtsho'i dpyad kyi mtsho'i dpyad kyi mtshan nyid ; rgya mtsho'i mtshan gyi dpyad
samullokitamukhaḥ (mvyut_6452) _ zhal du bltas pa ; zhal du ltas pa

sa maitrīsahagatena cittenāvaireṇāsapatnenāvyābādhena vipulena mahadgatenāpramāṇenādvayena subhāvitenaikāṁ diśam adhimucya sphāritvopasampadya viharati (mvyut_1508) _ 'gran zla med pa ; de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa ; de byams pa dang lhan cig pa'i sems 'khon med pa ; gnod pa med pa yangs pa chen por gyur ba tshad med pa mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so ; gnod pa med pa yangs pa rgya chen por gyur ba tshad med pa mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so

sarvakāyapratisaṁ vedya āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṁvedyāśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṁ prajānāti ; sarvakāyapratisaṁ vedī āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṁvedyāśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṁ prajānāti (mvyut_1177) _ lus kyis thams cad yang dag par myong zhing dbugs brngubs na lus kyis thams cad yang dag par myong zhing dbugs brngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so

sarvakāyapratisaṁ vedya praśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṁ vedya praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṁ prajānāti ; sarvakāyapratisaṁ vedya praśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṁ vedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṁ prajānāti ; sarvakāyapratisaṁ vedī praśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṁ vedya praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṁ prajānāti ; sarvakāyapratisaṁ vedī praśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṁ vedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṁ prajānāti (mvyut_1178) _ lus kyis thams cad yang dag par myong zhing dbugs phyung na lus kyis thams cad yang dag par myong zhing dbugs phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so

sarvacetasā samanvāhṛtya (mvyut_7260) _ sems kun gyis bsams te

sarvatathāgatadharmavāgniṣprapañcajñānamudrā (mvyut_4308) _ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshig spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya

sarvatathāgataviśvakarmajñānamudrā (mvyut_4310) _ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las sna tshogs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya
sarvatathāgataviṣayāvatārajñānakuśalaḥ (mvyut_835) _ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa
sarvatathāgatasantoṣaṇī (mvyut_4317) _ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes byed ma

sarvatathāgatasamājādhiṣṭāna jñānamudrā ; sarvatathāgatasamayādhiṣṭāna jñānamudrā (mvyut_4305) _ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i byin gyis brlab kyi ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i byin gyis brlab kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya
sarvatathāgatasuratasukhā (mvyut_4314) _ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgyes pa mchog gi bde ba
sarvatathāgatākarṣaṇī (mvyut_4315) _ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa
sarvatathāgatānurā gaṇājñānamudrā (mvyut_4302) _ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya
sarvatathāgatānurāgaṇī (mvyut_4316) _ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes byed ma
sarvatathāgatāśāparipūraṇajñānamudrā (mvyut_4304) _ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya
sarvatragāmanī pratipaj jñāna ; sarvatragāmanī pratipat jñāna (mvyut_125) _ thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs
sarvathā (mvyut_6407) _ rnam pa thams cad ; rnam pa thams cad dam ye ; ye

sarvaduḥkhaskandhasahānātmopādānasarvasattvadhātvaparityāginaḥ (mvyut_801) _ sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad bzod pa'i lus len pas sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba rnams
sarvadharmaniḥsaṁśayajñānaḥ (mvyut_362) _ chos thams cad la the tshom med pa'i ye shes mnga' ba

sarvadharmapaṭṭavābaddhābhiṣekaprāptibuddhadharmasaṅghaparyeṣṭisandarśanānivṛttāḥ (mvyut_804) _ chos thams cad kyi thabs sbyin pas dbang bskur ba thob par bya ba'i phir sangs rgyas kyi chos btsol ba bstan pa las phir mi ldog pa rnams
sarvadharmapadaprabhedano nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_570) _ chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
sarvadharmapraveśamudrā nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_517) _ chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
sarvadharmamudrā nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_512) _ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
sarvadharmaśūnyatā (mvyut_946) _ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
sarvadharmasamatājñānamudrā (mvyut_4301) _ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya
sarvadharmasamatā nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_566) _ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
sarvadharmasamavasaraṇasāgaramudrā nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_527) _ chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
sarvadharmātikramaṇo nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_588) _ chos thams cad las 'das ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
sarvadharmānāvaraṇajñānī (mvyut_832) _ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes can
sarvadharmāpravṛttinirdeśaḥ (mvyut_1362) _ chos thams cad 'byung ba med par bstan pa
sarvadharmābhisambodhivaiśāradyam (mvyut_131) _ chos thams cad mkhyen pa la mi 'jigs pa chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa
sarvadharmeśvaraḥ (mvyut_33) _ chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug
sarvadharmodgato nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_511) _ chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
sarvadhūpanāmāni (mvyut_6247) _ spos kyi rnam pa'i ming la

sarvadhyānavimoksasamādhi samāpattisaṅkleśavyavadānavyutthānajñānabalam (mvyut_126) _ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang ldan ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs
sarvanirodhavirodhasampraśamano nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_606) _ 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī (mvyut_651) _ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba
sarvapariphullam (mvyut_6232) _ me tog 'dab ma thams cad rgyas pa
sarvapraṇidhānanicrayavigataḥ (mvyut_820) _ smon lam la gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba
sarvabuddhaviṣayakuśalaḥ (mvyut_822) _ sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la mkhas pa
sarvabuddhaviṣayāvatārajñānālokālaṅkāraḥ (mvyut_1390) _ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang ba'i rgyan
sarvabuddhasamatāprāptiḥ (mvyut_355) _ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa
sarvabodhisattvasampratīcchītajñanaḥ (mvyut_366) _ ye shes byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yang dag par mnos pa
sarvamanaḥkarma jñānapūrvaṅgamam jñānānuparivarti (mvyut_150) _ yid kyi las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro zhin ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba
sarvamalāpagataḥ (mvyut_688) _ dri ma kun bral ; dri ma kun bral ba ; dri ma kun tu bral ; dri ma kun tu bral ba
sarvamāramaṇḍalavidhvaṁsanajñānamudrā (mvyut_4312) _ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya
sarvamāraviṣayasamātikrāntaḥ (mvyut_834) _ bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa
sarvalokadhātu prasaraḥ (mvyut_3063) _ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad ; 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad
sarvalokadhātuprasṛtakāyaḥ (mvyut_361) _ sku 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rab tu khyab pa
sarvaloke 'nabhiratisañjñā (mvyut_7007) _ 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes
sarvavākkarma jñānapūrvaṅgamam jñānānuparivarti (mvyut_149) _ ngag gi las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba
sarvavikṣepatā (mvyut_7985) _ thams cad rnam par 'byed ; thams cad rnam par 'gyed
sarvaviṣayāvabhāsālaṅkārapratibhānadarśanagarbhaḥ (mvyut_709) _ yul thams cad snang ba'i rgyan spobs pa ston pa'i snying po
sarvavaidalyasaṅgrahaḥ (mvyut_1385) _ rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa
sarvavairūpyopalabdhilakṣaṇam (mvyut_4413) _ thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid

sarvavyūharatisvabhāvanayasandarśanaḥ (mvyut_3390) _ bkod pa kun la dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshul bstan do ; bkod pa kun la dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshul ston pa ; bkod pa kun tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshul bstan do ; bkod pa kun tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshul ston pa
sarvaśabdānupraviṣṭā (mvyut_488) _ sgra thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa

sarvasampadadhigamāyanairyāṇika pratipattathātvavaiśāradyam (mvyut_134) _ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur bar nges par 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa ; phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur bar nges par byung ba lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa ; phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur bar nges par 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa ; phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur bar nges par byung ba lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa
sarvasattvasamacittaḥ (mvyut_833) _ sems thams cad la sems mnyam pa
sarvasattvahitābhyudyataḥ (mvyut_821) _ sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa
sarvasattvānāṁ kiṅkaraṇīyatā (mvyut_6448) _ sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod pa snyam pa
sarvasattvāśayasuvidhijñāḥ (mvyut_410) _ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa legs par sgrub shes pa
sarvasamādhivaśitāpāramiṅgataḥ (mvyut_872) _ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang pa'i pha rol tu son pa
sarvasārūpyopalabdhilakṣaṇam (mvyut_4412) _ thams cad mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid
sarvasukhaduḥkhanirabhinandī nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_607) _ bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
sarvasukhasamarpitaḥ (mvyut_7375) _ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa
sarvasvarapūraṇī (mvyut_498) _ sgra thams cad rdzogs par byed pa

sarvākaravaropetam (mvyut_2533) _ rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa ; rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa ; rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa 'm snam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa ; snam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa
sarvākāraprabhākaro nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_614) _ rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
sarvākāravaropetā (mvyut_504) _ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa
sarvākāravaropeto nāma samādhiḥ (mvyut_602) _ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchogs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
sarvāntaṁ parṣanmaṇḍalam (mvyut_6328) _ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
sarvārthasiddhaḥ (mvyut_743) _ don thams cad grub pa
sarvālaṅkāranāmāni (mvyut_5999) _ rgyan gyi rnam pa'i ming la
sarvāvaraṇavivaraṇaparyutthānavigataḥ ; sarvāvaraṇaparyutthānaparyupasthānavigataḥ (mvyut_814) _ sgrib pa dang chad pa dang kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba
sarvāśāparipūrakaḥ (mvyut_867) _ re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba
sarvāśravakṣayajñānavaiśāradyam (mvyut_132) _ zag pa zad pa thams cad mkhyen pa la mi 'jigs pa
sarveṇa sarvam (mvyut_6405) _ thams cad kyi thams cad
sarvendriyasantoṣaṇī (mvyut_499) _ dbang po thams cad tshim par byed pa
sarvopadhipratinisargaḥ (mvyut_2549) _ phung po kun spangs pa
salīlagajagāmī (mvyut_100) _ glang po che ltar 'gyin zhing bzhud pa
salīlam (mvyut_7342) _ 'chos pa ; 'jo bag can ; 'jo bag can nam 'chos pa
savikalpakam (mvyut_4471) _ rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa ; rnam par rtogs pa dang bcas pa
savikalpam (mvyut_7453) _ rnam par rtog pa dang bcas ; rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa

sa vitarkavicārāṇāṁ vyupaśamād adhyātmaṁ samprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ prītisukhaṁ dvitīyaṁ dhyānam upasampadya viharati (mvyut_1479) _ de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing ; nang yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyun gcig tu gyur bas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyas pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so
saśramaṇabrahmaṇikāḥ prajāḥ (mvyut_6425) _ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu

sa sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanaṁ samatikramyānantaṁ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasampadya viharati idam aṣṭamam abhibhvāyatanam (mvyut_1527) _ de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni gzil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o

sa sarvaśa ākāśānanty āyatanaṁ samatikramyānantaṁ vijñānam iti vijñānānanty āyatanam upasampadya viharati (mvyut_1493) _ de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ; rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so

sa sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanaṁ samatikramyānantaṁ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasampadya viharaty ayaṁ pañcamo vimokṣaḥ (mvyut_1515) _ de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ; rnam shes mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba lnga pa'o

sa sarvaśa ākiñcanyāyatanaṁ samatikramya naivasañjñānāsañjñāyatanam upasampadya viharaty ayaṁ saptamo vimokṣaḥ (mvyut_1517) _ de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes ma yin skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba bdun pa'o ; de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba bdun pa'o

sa sarvaśo ākiñcanyāyatanaṁ samatikramya naivasañjñānāsañjñāyatanam upasampadya viharati (mvyut_1495) _ de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so

sa sarvaśo naivasañjñanāsañjñāyatanam samatikramya sañjñāveditanirodhaṁ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharaty ayam aṣṭamo vimokṣaḥ (mvyut_1518) _ de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang 'tshor ba dang 'gog pa'i mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba brgyad pa'o ; de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang tshor ba dang 'gog pa'i mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba brgyad pa'o

sa sarvaśo rūpasañjñānāṁ samatikramāt pratighasañjñānām astaṅgamān nānātvasañjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśamity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasampadya viharati idaṁ saptamam abhibhvāyatanam (mvyut_1526) _ de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni gzil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o

sa sarvaśo rūpasañjñānāṁ samatikramāt pratighasañjñānām astaṅgamān nānātvasañjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasampadya viharati (mvyut_1492) _ de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te thog ma'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs pa'i 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so

sa sarvaśo rūpasaṇjñānāṁ samatikramāt pratigha sañjṅānām astaṅgamān nānā tvasañjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ityākāśānantyāyatanam upsampadya viharaty ayaṁ caturtho vimokṣaḥ ; sa sarvaśo rūpasaṇjñānāṁ samatikramāt pratigha prathama sañjṅānām astaṅgamān nānā tvasañjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ityākāśānantyāyatanam upsampadya viharaty ayaṁ caturtho vimokṣaḥ (mvyut_1514) _ de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te ; nam mkha' mtha' so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas nas gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba bzhi pa'o ; nam mkha' mtha' so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba bzhi pa'o ; nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas nas gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba bzhi pa'o ; nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba bzhi pa'o ; sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas ; thog ma'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing ; thog pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing

sa sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanaṁ samatikramya nāsti kiñcid ityākiñcanyāyatanam upasampadya viharati (mvyut_1494) _ de rnam pa thams cad du rnam par shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci yang med do zhes ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so

sa sarvaśo vijñānānanty āyatanam samatikramya nāsti kiñcidity ākiñcanyāyatanam upasampadya viharaty ayaṁ ṣaṣṭho vimokṣaḥ (mvyut_1516) _ de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba drug pa'o

sa sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṅgamād aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṁ caturthaṁ dhyānam upasampadya viharati (mvyut_1481) _ de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so

sahālokadhātuḥ (mvyut_3066) _ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams

div2.head: MVY 46
